name: Laser Shooter (Sapra)
description:
Well, this game is the first of the 3 hour game jam that I worked that friday (first and last) 

I worked on it, as the title says for 3 hours, or at least that's what I was trying to accomplish.

The objective if its not clear, is to reach the White Wall.

Controls:

-WASD to move

-Left Mouse to shoot

-Right Mouse to get bullets
